/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway, divided by a concrete barrier, stretches out ahead, flanked by lush green trees on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. Cars can be seen moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static landscape. On the right side of the road, a green sign stands out, although the text on it is not visible in the image. The overall scene is a blend of urban development and natural beauty, a common sight in many modern cities.
